Eligibility: • Menopausal women with early breast cancer of positive hormonal receptors and positive immunocytochemical cell result Tumor Disseminated following bone marrow aspiration prior to randomization
- current or previous malignancy in the previous five years (other than breast cancer or non-melanoma skin cancer or in situ cervical cancer adequately treated).
Results: * Patients without event at 12 months (where event = death (of any cause), tumour cells disseminated positive at 12 months or recurrence of clinical diseases)
Title of the arm/group: Fulvestant + Anastrozole
Description of the arm/group: flulvestrant 500 mg + anastrozole 1 mg
Description of the arm/group: anastrozole 1 mg
